title: digitalica
author: digitalica
content: after 2 years thanks to devs from the community the issue where POS block emission made peers get banned is solved.better experience from now on, on staking, mining and transactionsalso GPU miner from WILDRIG and SRBminer is outCPU mining still availableName: CURVEHASH CoinTicker: CURVEConsensus: POW/POSBlock Reward: 70 CURVEHalving: NOPoS staking reward: 2.5% per yearBlock time: 3 minutesAlgorithm: curve25519 (custom)Difficulty retargeting: every blockConfirmations: 101Max supply: 37milPremine: 2.7milPremine was decided to pay for developing, bounties, marketing and exchanges (listed on GRAVIEX for 6000 USDT).CURVE is a payment system.CURVE is an evolution of Bitcoin core.There are only 2 Curvehash algo coins in all the world. (2022 - other coins adopted this algo following our project)We plan to integrate CURVE in more wallets and exchanges.LINKSMARKETS:https://graviex.net/markets/curvebtchttps://graviex.net/markets/curveethhttps://graviex.net/markets/curveusdthttps://www.bitsails.com/market?MarketName=BTC-CURVEWebsite:http://curvehashcoin.com/website will be rebuilt soonMining Pools:OFFICIAL - https://pow.curvehashcoin.com/Github:https://github.com/curvehashcoin/https://github.com/cryptodigi/CurvehashCoin (2022) will keep this updatedExplorer:http://explorer.curvehashcoin.com/Telegram:https://t.me/curvehashcoinDiscord:https://discord.gg/dygT3bZrwG (new - 2022)About curvehash algo:https://cr.yp.to/ecdh.html#use
